game.title: Eternal Realms
game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, players take on the role of an apprentice mage tasked with uncovering the cause of this event and restoring magic to the realm.
game.ending: After traversing treacherous landscapes, battling formidable foes, and solving complex puzzles, the player ultimately discovers that a powerful sorceress was responsible for the disappearance of magic. The player must then decide whether to restore magic or maintain the balance of power in the world.
game.synopsis: The game follows the journey of an apprentice mage as they seek to revive a world without magic. Along the way, they will encounter ancient ruins, mysterious creatures, and forgotten lore that hold the key to restoring magic. With every step closer to their goal, the player must navigate the consequences of their actions and face the ultimate decision: to bring back magic or keep it lost forever.
